NF.Q: In the column Mitigation Measures of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 42569? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 15087 and 23461? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node None to node Livestock and from node Afforestation to node Livestock, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {None} to node {Livestock} is larger.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Afforestation to node Livestock and from node Renewable Energy to node Coal Combustion, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Renewable Energy} to node {Coal Combustion} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Manufacturing to node Afforestation, from node Power Generation to node Renewable Energy, and from node Renewable Energy to node Natural Gas, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Manufacturing} to node {Afforestation} is the largest.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Carbon Capture to node Livestock, from node Power Generation to node Carbon Capture, and from node Renewable Energy to node Coal Combustion, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Renewable Energy} to node {Coal Combustion} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Mitigation Measures of the sankey chart is the most critical?
MSR.A: The most critical node in the column Mitigation Measures is {Afforestation}.

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Transportation to target node Livestock? Please list all node labels along this path.
